welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Loenen, a charming city known for its beautiful canals and traditional windmills. Get ready to explore and discover all the unique treasures this city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Schiphol Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Schiphol Airport, primarily serving European flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A modern terminal at Schiphol Airport, serving mainly long-haul flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Soesterberg Air Base Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including restaurants, shops, and lounges.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rotterdam Zestienhoven Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Rotterdam Zestienhoven Airport, primarily used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
